issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.name: Client

fields.description:
Description:
While testing Kitchensink, Platform>XHR>File download, pressing on "Set web view (URL) fails and the following appears in the conosole:

Tue Aug 23 14:40:46 unknown UIKitApplication:com.appcelerator.titanium[0xaf20][133] <Notice>: [WARN] couldn't load URL: app://com.appcelerator.titanium/var/mobile/Applications/C960D466-B219-409E-AC8F-4433247E2636/Documents/test.pdf


Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on iPod 3rd gen.
2) Navigate to Platform>XHR>File download
3) Tap on "set web view (url)" button
4) Check log output

Result:
The test fails to load anything, and the above-listed log output is visible in the log

Expected result:
Test loads the desired content

Notes:
Did not occur in 1.7.2
fields.summary: Kitchensink: Platform>XHR>File download set web view (url) fails
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.v20110819142548 on iPod 3rd Gen 4.0.2, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535

comments.body: No longer able to reproduce. Must've been some sort of network issue despite other network apps functioning as expected.
